column5: HAPPY FATHER'S DAY TO EVERYONE.....now us old guys have been through this many times....but what would be nice to hear from those who just became fathers...

That's me!  My little boy is only 5 weeks old and it feels pretty cool to be a father on fathers day... And he (the wife) even got me a nice card...  Can't wait for annual fathers day fishing trips with the little bugger...

This is my second fathers day and after we see the wifes dad we are going to my parents and I am going to bring the daughter fishin for some perch. She knows how to reel lol so we will see it's just for fun though nice gift to me though.

I have a 5 year old and 3 year old and a new little guy who's only 6 weeks old.  We are all heading out in the boat today for a panfish bonanza and after the kids are satisfied hopefully we can get me a new PB laker(the lake has a 1 week lake trout season).
Where did you find a life vest for a 6 month old?  Smallest I found was a 20lb-30lb vest

I have one that my parents got for my daughter and it fit her good I'm not sure where they got it I will ask where they got it and if they don't need it I'll let you know it's new been used a couple times.
My boy will be 2 in August.  Was a great day, spent it with family at a pool party.  I feel like he's at the most awesome age right now, such fun times and everyday is still something new.
7 week old daughter.  8 month old boat that has been on the water twice.  Keep trying to blame it on her but the math doesn't work.
It's made by Salus(spelling).  I got it at Lefebve's here in North Bay
